2086640.name: Cat Seeker
2086640.description:
It's time to go home, but where have all the kitten run off to?
A friendly game of hide and seek begins!

Find all the cats hiding in various cute environments, but watch out! All of these kittens have their own way of playing. Find and catch them all!

Seek out and find all the energetic little cats, and explore the areas to find hidden treasures.

  • Dozens of stages across 5 environments.
  • Mouse, keyboard, and joypad support.
  • Unlockable accessories.
